item.title: searching blogs in hugo
item.description: As websites grow, incorporating a search feature becomes increasingly crucial. However, implementing search functionality can be challenging on a statically generated site since there’s no server-side component to handle the search. Instead, the search must be performed on the client side within the browser using JavaScript.
